tal:block.h1: DJ Vadim / "Kill Kill Kill" "Talk to Me" Remix Contest Sources
tal:block.p: DJ Vadim is offering audio source files from the song "Kill Kill Kill" and "Talk to Me" online under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial license, so that producers worldwide can use the sounds in remixes and new compositions. The sources are available both as a selection of looped or, if you want to cut your own samples, the original solo tracks from the entire recording session are available as well.
In order to use these files you need an 'unzip' utility (for Windows we suggest the fine and free 7-zip) and the FLAC decoder.
You can download the a cappellas and pre-cut loops here. Right-click (Mac: control-click) on the buttons below and select 'Save Target As..'.
If the pre-cut loops aren't doing it for you can cut your own samples out of the original studio tracks, including the a cappellas.
To download right click (control on Mac) on these buttons and select 'Save Target As...'
